mapper.select: select id, order_form_id, user_id, is_admin, dateline, status_paid, status_delivery, status_refund, log_name, log_remark from nxtframework.nxt_order_form_log where id = #{id}
select id, order_form_id, user_id, is_admin, dateline, status_paid, status_delivery, status_refund, log_name, log_remark from nxtframework.nxt_order_form_log limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into nxtframework.nxt_order_form_log(order_form_id, user_id, is_admin, dateline, status_paid, status_delivery, status_refund, log_name, log_remark) values (#{orderFormId}, #{userId}, #{isAdmin}, #{dateline}, #{statusPaid}, #{statusDelivery}, #{statusRefund}, #{logName}, #{logRemark})

insert into nxtframework.nxt_order_form_log(order_form_id, user_id, is_admin, dateline, status_paid, status_delivery, status_refund, log_name, log_remark) values
(#{entity.orderFormId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.isAdmin}, #{entity.dateline}, #{entity.statusPaid}, #{entity.statusDelivery}, #{entity.statusRefund}, #{entity.logName}, #{entity.logRemark})

insert into nxtframework.nxt_order_form_log(order_form_id, user_id, is_admin, dateline, status_paid, status_delivery, status_refund, log_name, log_remark) values
(#{entity.orderFormId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.isAdmin}, #{entity.dateline}, #{entity.statusPaid}, #{entity.statusDelivery}, #{entity.statusRefund}, #{entity.logName}, #{entity.logRemark})
on duplicate key update order_form_id = values(order_form_id) , user_id = values(user_id) , is_admin = values(is_admin) , dateline = values(dateline) , status_paid = values(status_paid) , status_delivery = values(status_delivery) , status_refund = values(status_refund) , log_name = values(log_name) , log_remark = values(log_remark)
mapper.update:
update nxtframework.nxt_order_form_log
order_form_id = #{orderFormId},
user_id = #{userId},
is_admin = #{isAdmin},
dateline = #{dateline},
status_paid = #{statusPaid},
status_delivery = #{statusDelivery},
status_refund = #{statusRefund},
log_name = #{logName},
log_remark = #{logRemark},
where id = #{id}
